Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches an event handler function for an event.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches an event handler function for multiple events.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches event handler functions for different events.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches a gesture recognizer to the view for all its states.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:_:_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches a gesture recognizer to the view for a given state.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches a gesture recognizer to the view for multiple states.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: on(_:_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Attaches a gesture recognizer to the view and declares callbacks for its different states.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: off(_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Detaches a gesture recognizer from the receiving view.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: off(_:)
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Detaches all the gestures recognizer of a given type from the receiving view.

Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.name: off()
Protocols/Gesture.html#/s:7GestureAAPAAS.abstract: Detaches all the gestures recognizer from the receiving view.
